item.title: Niloofar add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart" -- Helen Keller

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by Edward Everett Hale
item.description: "I am only one, but still I am one. I cannot do everything, but still I can do something; and because I cannot do everything, I will not refuse to do something that I can do." -- Edward Everett Hale

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description:
"The Road Not Taken
Two roads diverged in a yellow wood, And sorry I could not travel both And be one traveler, long I stood And looked down one as far as I could To where it bent in the undergrowth;
Then took the other, as just as fair, And having perhaps the better claim, Because it was grassy and wanted wear; Though as for that the passing there Had worn them really about the same,
And both that morning equally lay In leaves no step had trodden black. Oh, I kept the first for another day! Yet knowing how way leads on to way, I doubted if I should ever come back.
I shall be telling this with a sigh Somewhere ages and ages hence: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I— I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Some say the world will end in fire, Some say in ice. From what I've tasted of desire, I hold with those who favor fire. But if it had to perish twice I think I know enough of hate To say that for destruction ice Is also great And would suffice." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by Walt Whitman
item.description: "Resist much, obey little." -- Walt Whitman

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by Langston Hughes
item.description: "Hold fast to dreams, For if dreams die Life is a broken-winged bird, That cannot fly." -- Langston Hughes

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by Langston Hughes
item.description: "Folks, I'm telling you, birthing is hard and dying is mean- so get yourself a little loving in between." -- Langston Hughes

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Man is the only creature who refuses to be what he is." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by nader ebrahimi
item.description: "ANJAME MA , SARANJAME MA NIST " -- nader ebrahimi

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by Nader Ebrahimi
item.description: "dar ruzgare fetneh,dastha por kolah va sarha bikolah ast" -- Nader Ebrahimi

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by اخوان ثالث
item.description: "هی فلانی! زندگی شاید همین باشد؟ یک فریب ساده و کوچک آن هم از دست عزیزی که تو دنیا را جز برای او و جز با او نمی خواهی. من گمانم زندگی باید همین باشد." -- اخوان ثالث

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by حسین سناپور
item.description: "فقط دشمن ها هستند که همیشه حرف هم را بی هیچ کم و کاستی می فهمند. اغلب هم لبخندی چاشنی گفت و گویشان است . دوستی همیشه با سوء تفاهم همراه است . عشق که خیلی بیشتر." -- حسین سناپور

item.title: Niloofar add a quote by ناظم حکمت
item.description:
"زیباترین دریا را هنوز نپیمو ده اند زیباترین کودک هنوز بزرگ نشده زیباترین روزهایمان را هنوز ندیده ایم و زیباترین واژه ها را هنوز برایت نگفته ام...
" -- ناظم حکمت
